Summary: 2 balls of light flying around in random direction. Chasing each other.
divs: Sighting DetailsI saw two balls of light in Laughlin NV. They seemed to be flying at an altitude as a jet airliner would be, but they were moving very fast in random direction. They shifted direction back and forth very smoothly. They were traveling at random speeds back and forth and the two balls of light seemed to be chasing one another, like they were aviation dog fighters.
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Laughlin
There were no other sightings in Laughlin on or around March 8th 2013
